Title: Database Searcher
Description: This is a small tool for searching a typed value inside all type matching columns and rows of a database. For connecting the database a .NET data provider for the server is required. The code is written in C# 3.0
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a small tool for searching a typed value inside all type matching columns and rows of a database. For connecting the database a .NET data provider for the server is required. The code is written in C# 3.0

Uses the WPF-Toolkit DataGrid, .NET 3.5 SP1 and Visual Studio 2008.
